metadata.description: Major 500kV, 345kV, and 230kV substations in the Western Interconnection with accurate EIA-860 generator data
metadata.coverage: Western US - comprehensive transmission nodes including major power plants, solar farms, and wind farms
metadata.notes: Expanded Phase A - High voltage substations covering California, Pacific Northwest, Southwest, and Intermountain regions. Generator capacities from EIA-860 Form data.

interconnection.name: Western Interconnection
interconnection.description: Western Interconnection covering states west of the Rocky Mountains, parts of Canada and Mexico
